title: Excess First Strike Icon Blueprints

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I bought the icon blueprints for 750 IP each and then bought the bundle which ended up giving me a second copy of each of these icon blueprints which should be useless however when I click on them it still says I can craft the icon again.

EDIT: The screenshot is after I already crafted the 3 icons.

replies.body:
Hey there,

You should post this as a bug report over on the [Report a Bug board (NA)](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report), please remember to read the [How to Report a Game Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/3mQGBEjA-how-to-report-a-game-bug) sticky before posting.
